english.segment1: I gaze into Your Glorious light. I know Youre with me day and night. And now I want to praise Your name
english.segment2: Theres nothing else that I want more. Than just to look at You in awe. I sense Your Spirit set to move
english.segment3: I know Your love it never ends. I know Your power gives me strength. I know somehow Ill never be the same
english.segment4: Its Your grace. That brought me freedom to praise. And glorify Your Name. My passion is to worship You. It's Your love. A sacrifice to give eternal life. I praise You Lord. And Glorify Your name
